thread.title: P&G Fails to Shake Continued Weakness
thread.title_full: P&G Fails to Shake Continued Weakness

title: P&G Fails to Shake Continued Weakness
text:
P&G Fails to Shake Continued Weakness Sales in latest quarter fell 9%, dragged down by dollar; outlook is cautious By Updated July 30, 2015 4:00 p.m. ET 
Growth remains elusive at Procter & Gamble Co. 
Sales growth decelerated at the worldâ€™s largest consumer-products company over the past year, underlining the depth of challenges it faces as it completes the exits of close to 100 brands and installs a new chief executive in the coming months. 
The Cincinnati maker of Tide detergent, Crest toothpaste and Pampers diapers reported a 9% sales drop for the three months ended in... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
